comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: The ship on the lhs looks like HMS Boomerang - handle.slv.vic.gov.au/10381/28806 ; per this SMH item (column 1) the Boomerang's rudder was damaged when she was docked at the Fitzroy Dock at Cockatoo Island in September 1891 - nla.gov.au/nla.news-page1378171 ; I gather this docking incident occurred soon after HMS Boomerang arrived on the Australian Station...the locals apparently weren't familiar with her keel/rudder design
